title: The Atmosphere An Introduction to Meteorology 12th c2013 Lutgens
description:
The Atmosphere: An Introduction to Meteorology, 12th Edition (c2013), textbook authored by Frederick K. Lutgens & Edward J. Tarbuck, and illustrated by Dennis Tasa.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://www.pearsonhighered.com/educator/product/9780321756312.page" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.pearsonhighered.com/educator/product/9780321756312.page</a>
